title: The Supreme Court Should Hear Case Seeking to Overturn Gonzales v. Raich
description: Raich is one of the Court's worst federalism decisions,holding that Congress's power to regulate interstate commerce allows it to ban possession of marijuana that never crossed state lines, and was never sold in any market.
content:
A cannabis plant. (NA)
   A recent petition for certiorari in the case of Canna Provisions, Inc. v. Bondi, asks the Supreme Court to overrule its terrible decision in Gonzales v. Raich (2005), which… [+4476 chars]
